name: The Dawn of Man (samuelbromley)
description:
'The Dawn of Man' is an endless runner/infinite runner game like Canabalt - but with a slight twist...

Your character has to evolve from ape, all the way through the stages of early man.

The game is loosely based around themes relating to 2001: A Space Odyssey (my favourite film) and was an entry to evolution-themed XanderJam #3.
